snippet.title: On-Court Tennis for the Commodore 64 longplay
snippet.description:
On-Court Tennis for the Commodore 64 longplay

This tennis game by  Gamestar from 1984 requires the player focus on timing and direction of their shots. The computer moves the character automatically. Smash or lob shots to the left, right or center is your main strategy.

Choose one or two players. It also has a demo mode. 

In addition, there are three playing surfaces to choose from: grass, clay or hard surface.

Four characters await your selection and are based on real life players of the time. Jimmy Conners, Björn Borg, John McEnroe and Ivan Lendl are all up to the challenge.

The AI has the ability to ramp up difficulty to match your skills. In addition, if you are having a bad day so will the AI.

Accurate scoring and rules apply.

#c64 #oncourt #tennis
